This package contains miscellaneous support code for analysis done for the AML PMP RNA-Seq Diagnostic Manuscript.

At present, these functions aren't conceptually related beyond being 'supporting functions to help run analyses related to the AML PMP RNA-Seq Diagnostic Manuscript'.
